snippet: The British drama, perfect counterprogramming by PBS, was the second-most-watched show on Sunday night with 6.8 million viewers, a 3 percent rise from last year.
lead_paragraph: The British drama, perfect counterprogramming by PBS, was the second-most-watched show on Sunday night with 6.8 million viewers, a 3 percent rise from last year.

headline.main: Dull Super Bowl Made ‘Downton Abbey’ a Thrill, as Nearly 7 Million Watched
